Section.name: About CBRI
Section.description:
Central Building Research Institute (CBRI), Roorkee was founded in 1947. It has been approved by the Council of Scientific and Indian Research (CSIR). The institute offers M.Tech across one specialization at the PG level and Ph.D. in Science and Engineering at the Doctoral level. CBRI Roorkee provides high-quality research education with its well-educated faculties and consists of excellent infrastructural facilities. Candidates can apply online for admission.
